text: Eisenstadt (Hungarian: Kismarton, Austro-Bavarian: Eisnstod, Croatian: Å½eljezno) is a city in Austria. It is the capital and a district of Burgenland. About 14,000 people are living there (2016). It is near the Hungarian border. == Other websites == * Category:Settlements in Burgenland Category:Districts of Burgenland Category:Austrian state capitals Category:Cities in Austria
title: Eisenstadt
